title: Apple's self service repair program got released, let's check it out
description:
👉 https://tinyurl.com/rossmatrix
👉 Self service repair: https://www.selfservicerepair.com/order
👉 Tool rental: https://www.selfservicerepair.com/tool-kit-rental
👉 https://leg.colorado.gov/sites/default/files/documents/2021A/bills/2021a_1199_01.pdf
👉 Samsung repair program: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MBsZHaGLF-Y
👉 You'll still need third parties for charge ports, buttons & more: https://www.mobilesentrix.com/replacement-parts/apple/iphone-parts/iphone-12
👉 Apple PR statement on how expensive BGA is: https://support.apple.com/content/dam/edam/applecare/images/en_US/otherassets/programs/Expanding_Access_to_Service_and_Repairs.pdf
👉 Louis selling a sub-$300 BGA system we use for repairs: https://store.rossmanngroup.com/atten-862.html
https://www.fda.gov/media/113431/download
👉 CTIA testimony & rebuttal, part 1: https://youtu.be/HYpL8Mn4Tcs
👉 CTIA testimony & rebuttal, part 2: https://youtu.be/Mjsann_Efhc
More advanced BGA rework in my office: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xRwfJpNvWI0
👉 Apple BGA rework example: https://youtu.be/AUaJ8pDlxi8?t=710
